dia.en: It's the door to the hallway. You need a keycard to get through.
I don't think the guard will like me going back there.
It's the door to the hallway. You need a keycard to get through.
You need a keycard to get through.
It's the door to the hallway.
It's a poster advertising the cybernetic enhancements they perform here at Future Tech.
The slogan is, "It's gonna be the Future Soon. Lets get ready for it."
I don't want it.
It's the company receptionist
Hi
How can I help you?
Oh, sorry Dr Martin, I didn't realise it was you.
I don't feel like using that person, for now.
It's a reception desk.
Nothing of interest
It's a reception desk.
Nothing of interest
It's the door to get outside.
Hey, I just remembered something. I think it's my address...
How convenient.
It's a lot of Future Tech brochures.
There is one for every augmentation you can think of.
New eyes, new arms and legs, improve your lung capacity, new improved blood replacement that makes you able to do exercise 5 times as long!
And here is one for male enhancments...if you know what I mean.
I don't want that.
Some waiting area chairs.
I don't think the guard will like me sitting down.
Just a customer.
Hi.
Um...hi
I don't feel like using that person, for now.
It's the waiting area.
I don't think the guard will like me sitting down.
Hey, it's Paul and Storm!
You sound like a fan, don't bother them, they won't appreciate being bothered by you.
Hi
Hi
Hi
I don't feel like using that person, for now.

title.en: We'd be awesome at arm wrestling, is my 'Madonna' cover band.

dia.en: We'd be awesome at arm wrestling, is my 'Madonna' cover band.
Hey, that's our joke premise!

title.en: Sounds like you need to think this through a little more.

dia.en: Sounds like you need to think this through a little more.
No, I think we have done that enough.
Well, there is still the issue with whose junk we are keeping.
There is still the issue with whose junk we are keeping, is the name of my 'N-Sync' cover band.

title.en: Surely you're going to have too many body parts?

dia.en: Surely you're going to have too many body parts?
We're going to have too many body parts, is the name of my 'Osmonds' cover band.

title.en: Aren't you going to be short a few things?

dia.en: Aren't you going to be short a few things?
Aren't you going to be short a few things? is the name of my 'Prince' cover band.

title.en: Aren't you too old for this?

dia.en: Aren't you too old for this?
Aren't you too old for this? is my 'Rolling Stones' cover band.

title.en: This isn't funny anymore, I really have to pee.

dia.en: This isn't funny anymore, I really have to pee.
This isn't funny anymore, I really have to pee, is my 'R. Kelly' cover band.
Nevermind
What does gestalt mean?
Die Gestalt is a German word for form or shape. It is used in English to refer to a concept of 'wholeness'
We mean we are going to become one person.

title.en: What do your wives think of the operation?

dia.en: What do your wives think of the operation?
I don't know, we haven't told them.

title.en: Won't that be a little weird?

dia.en: Won't that be a little weird?
In what way?
Well how will you....
What about when you...
Nevermind

title.en: What are you going to call yourself?

dia.en: What are you going to call yourself?
Paul Storm
I thought we were going to be Storm Paul?
Nah, that sounds like there will be other kinds of Paul. Like Sunny Paul
Well how come your name gets to be first?
Come on we've talked about this. You get the left side, I get the right. It's the way it's always been.
Exactly, isn't it my turn to go first? And I'm right handed!
So am I!
Well how about we have two arms on one side.
Hey! That's not a bad idea! Plus we'd be awesome at arm wrestling!
Exactly!

title.en: Have you thought about whose house you will live in?

dia.en: Have you thought about whose house you will live in?
Well mine obviously.
What do you mean yours?

title.en: You guys going to have two heads?

dia.en: You guys going to have two heads?
No
Yes
What? Well whose head do we keep then? And what happens to the other person's head? Does it get thrown away? Are you still really you without your head?
Hmmm, I guess two heads are better than one.
Yeah, double brain power!
Oh my god!
So intense.

title.en: I don't want to discuss the operation anymore.

dia.en: I don't want to discuss the operation anymore.
I'm starting to feel queasy.
StAR!wars.
So we need more pirate jokes.
BendAR!
You went with that instead of R2D2?
Your favourite film?
AR! 2D2
Your favourite film?
You went with that instead of R2D2?
Your favourite film?
Optimus Prime
You went with that instead of R2D2?
Your favourite film?
CybAR!man
You went with that instead of R2D2?
Your favourite film?
iDog
You went with that instead of R2D2?
Your favourite film?
Todd T-1000
You went with that instead of R2D2?
Your favourite film?
What then?
We are looking for new pirate jokes.
You know the ones.
What is a pirates favourite Droid?

title.en: Talk you out of the operation?

dia.en: Talk you out of the operation?
No

title.en: Play ukelele on stage with you?

dia.en: Play ukelele on stage with you?
No that is Molly's job.

title.en: What could I possibly do for you?

dia.en: What could I possibly do for you?
That wasn't a very funny quip.
Is that enough?
No, we need more.
Yes, that is loads.
As a reward, here is a USB key.
It has a picture of our friend Jonathan on.
It used to have all his music on, until someone overwrote it with a Tina T-1337 personality file. Naming no names..Paul!
It sounded like it would be fun to have an artificial intelligence to talk to, but she only ever wanted to talk about robot things.
Thanks, that sounds....useful?
Yeah, I bet you are really glad you did all that work for them!
What do robot pirates drink?
Bottles of RAM.
Funny

title.en: What is a pirate's favourite sock?

dia.en: What is a pirate's favourite sock?
AR!gyle.
Funny

title.en: What is a pirate's favourite crime?

dia.en: What is a pirate's favourite crime?
AR!son.
Funny

title.en: What is a pirate's favourite crime?

dia.en: What is a pirate's favourite crime?
Grand LAR!sony.
Funny

title.en: What do you call a parrot saying, 'Pieces of seven! Pieces of seven!'?

dia.en: What do you call a parrot saying, 'Pieces of seven! Pieces of seven!'?
A parroty error.
Funny
You fight like a cow!
Haha! Yeah!
That isn't funny on it's own.
It's a reference, not a joke.
We need jokes! New ones!
I'm out of jokes.
Come back when you have more.
What are you doing here?
We decided to go for the operation
You don't mean?
We're becoming a gestalt entity.
I love your songs.
Espcecially the one about pirates.
The Captain's Wife's Lament
Yeah
Well, you might be able to do us a favour.

title.en: I have a pirate joke for you.

dia.en: I have a pirate joke for you.
Ok, lets hear it.
Bye
Yes
But Dr Martin....you make comments about the patients in their files that you really wouldn't want them to see.
Fine.
No
So why would it be ok to let you see your file?
Fine.

title.en: Could I have the files you have on me?

dia.en: Could I have the files you have on me?
Oh I'm sorry, I can't give out personal information about our practioners. It wouldn't be professional.
But it's about me.
Surely you know everything there is to know about you?
I'm suffering memory loss at the moment.
I'm not falling for that one again.
No one has ever told me it is ok to give people files on themselves, under any circumstances.
So are you saying it is ok for me to give patients their files too?

title.en: What clients do I have today?

dia.en: What clients do I have today?
I'm too busy to talk right now.
You don't look busy. It looks like you're playing minesweeper on you're computer!
No this is important work, it just looks like minesweeper.
Ah! Now look what you made me do I set off all the mines...I mean...er...I lost the document.
Are you still busy?
Yes
Still playing minesweeper?
No, Im playing solitaire now....er...I mean no Im working now...er...I was always working, I mean Im checking customer records now.
I didnt know we had the king and queen of hearts as clients.
Please doctor, Im trying to work.
Still busy?
Yes!

title.en: Why are Paul and Storm here?

dia.en: Why are Paul and Storm here?
They're here for a consultation. They want a gustualt entity installed or something.
Bye
What are you having done?
Um...that's private.
I work here.
Oh right.
I'm here for laser eye surgery
You should see an optician for that.
No, having laser beams coming out my eyes!
Oh, that sounds dangerous.
Maybe I should think about it some more.

title.en: I'm your doctor, what can I do for you today?

dia.en: I'm your doctor, what can I do for you today?
Er, well, um.
Oh, hold on, you are not the correct person.
How do you know you haven't asked my name?
What is your name?
Billy
No, I'm looking for Arnold.
Is that backpack surgically attached?
Yeah, it was done to fix my asthma. It did a great job.
It pumps oxygen directly into my lungs. I just need to change the oxygen cylinder once a week.
Now I can play sports, run and you know.
Not that I do any of that, but it's good to know I could if the situation arose.
Bye
You have told me enough

title.en: Who do I need to talk to?

dia.en: Who do I need to talk to?
Talk to Paul and Storm

title.en: Why do I need to talk to Paul and Storm?

dia.en: Why do I need to talk to Paul and Storm?
They give you a task to do.
No More Help Please

title.en: What do I need to do here?

dia.en: What do I need to do here?
Talk to people
I need more pirate jokes
Try examining everything in all the rooms
If you need to discover a joke in a room, the help system will help you find it

title.en: What do I need to do here?

dia.en: What do I need to do here?
Just leave

title.en: What else can I do here?

dia.en: What else can I do here?
You might be able to get through that secure door now.
